com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class SchedulerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.SchedulerBuilder

  • public class SchedulerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a new DefaultScheduler.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SchedulerBuilder(ServiceSpec serviceSpec, SchedulerConfig schedulerConfig) 
      SchedulerBuilder(ServiceSpec serviceSpec, SchedulerConfig schedulerConfig, Persister persister) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractScheduler build()
      Creates a new Mesos scheduler instance with the provided values or their defaults, or an empty Optional if no Mesos scheduler should be registered for this run.
      Persister getPersister()
      Returns the Persister object which was provided via the constructor, or which was created by default internally.
      (package private) static PlacementRule getRegionRule(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> schedulerRegion) 
      SchedulerConfig getSchedulerConfig()
      Returns the SchedulerConfig object which was provided via the constructor.
      ServiceSpec getServiceSpec()
      Returns the ServiceSpec which was provided via the constructor.
      (package private) java.util.Collection<Plan> selectDeployPlan(java.util.Collection<Plan> plans, boolean hasCompletedDeployment)
      Replaces the deploy plan with an update plan, in the case that an update deployment is being performed AND that a custom update plan has been specified.
      SchedulerBuilder setCustomConfigValidators(java.util.Collection<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> customConfigValidators)
      Specifies a custom list of configuration validators to be run when updating to a new target configuration, or otherwise uses the default validators returned by DefaultConfigValidators.getValidators(SchedulerConfig).
      SchedulerBuilder setCustomResources(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> customResources)
      Specifies custom endpoint resources which should be exposed through the scheduler's API server, in addition to the defaults.
      SchedulerBuilder setEndpointProducer(java.lang.String name, EndpointProducer endpointProducer)
      Specifies a custom EndpointProducer to be added to the /endpoints API.
      SchedulerBuilder setNamespace(java.lang.String namespace)
      Assigns a custom namespace for this service.
      SchedulerBuilder setPlanCustomizer(PlanCustomizer planCustomizer)
      Assigns a PlanCustomizer to be used for customizing plans.
      SchedulerBuilder setPlansFrom(RawServiceSpec rawServiceSpec)
      Sets the Plans from the provided RawServiceSpec to this instance, using a DefaultPlanGenerator to handle conversion.
      SchedulerBuilder setRecoveryManagerFactory(RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory recoveryPlanOverriderFactory)
      Assigns a RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory to be used for generating the recovery plan manager.
      SchedulerBuilder setTemplateUrlFactory(ArtifactQueries.TemplateUrlFactory templateUrlFactory)
      Assigns a custom factory for generating config template URLs.
      (package private) static PodSpec updatePodPlacement(PodSpec podSpec)
      Update pods with appropriate placement constraints to enforce user REGION intent.
      SchedulerBuilder withSingleRegionConstraint()
      Configures the resulting scheduler instance with a region constraint.

      • setCustomConfigValidators

        public SchedulerBuilder setCustomConfigValidators(java.util.Collection<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> customConfigValidators)
        Specifies a custom list of configuration validators to be run when updating to a new target configuration, or otherwise uses the default validators returned by DefaultConfigValidators.getValidators(SchedulerConfig).

      • setEndpointProducer

        public SchedulerBuilder setEndpointProducer(java.lang.String name,
                                            EndpointProducer endpointProducer)
        Specifies a custom EndpointProducer to be added to the /endpoints API. This may be used by services which wish to expose custom endpoint information via that API.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the endpoint to be exposed
        endpointProducer - the producer to be invoked when the provided endpoint name is requested

      • setPlansFrom

        public SchedulerBuilder setPlansFrom(RawServiceSpec rawServiceSpec)
                              throws ConfigStoreException
        Sets the Plans from the provided RawServiceSpec to this instance, using a DefaultPlanGenerator to handle conversion.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreException

      • setRecoveryManagerFactory

        public SchedulerBuilder setRecoveryManagerFactory(RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory recoveryPlanOverriderFactory)
        Assigns a RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory to be used for generating the recovery plan manager.
        Parameters:
        recoveryPlanOverriderFactory - the factory which generates the custom recovery plan manager

      • setPlanCustomizer

        public SchedulerBuilder setPlanCustomizer(PlanCustomizer planCustomizer)
        Assigns a PlanCustomizer to be used for customizing plans.
        Parameters:

      • withSingleRegionConstraint

      • getRegionRule

        static PlacementRule getRegionRule(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> schedulerRegion)

      • setNamespace

        public SchedulerBuilder setNamespace(java.lang.String namespace)
        Assigns a custom namespace for this service. This is only relevant when a single framework is running multiple services, where different services need to be differentiated from each other. The namespace is used for both storage in ZK (StateStore/ConfigStore), as well as in resource labels.

      • setTemplateUrlFactory

        public SchedulerBuilder setTemplateUrlFactory(ArtifactQueries.TemplateUrlFactory templateUrlFactory)
        Assigns a custom factory for generating config template URLs. Otherwise a default suitable for use with ArtifactResource is used.

      • build

        public AbstractScheduler build()
        Creates a new Mesos scheduler instance with the provided values or their defaults, or an empty Optional if no Mesos scheduler should be registered for this run.
        Returns:
        a new Mesos scheduler instance to be registered, or an empty Optional
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if validating the provided configuration failed

      • updatePodPlacement

        static PodSpec updatePodPlacement(PodSpec podSpec)
        Update pods with appropriate placement constraints to enforce user REGION intent. If a pod's placement rules do not explicitly reference a REGION the assumption should be that the user intends that a pod be restriced to the local REGION.
        Parameters:
        podSpec - The PodSpec whose placement rule will be updated to enforce appropriate region placement.
        Returns:
        The updated PodSpec

      • selectDeployPlan

        java.util.Collection<Plan> selectDeployPlan(java.util.Collection<Plan> plans,
                                            boolean hasCompletedDeployment)
        Replaces the deploy plan with an update plan, in the case that an update deployment is being performed AND that a custom update plan has been specified.
